description: Parse documents and extract data from PDFs, DOCX files, images, and webpages using Parser Expert's powerful API.

actions.name: get_extracted_data
actions.description: Retrieve the extracted data using the parser ID and bucket ID. The parser ID is returned when you upload a document.

actions.name: upload_document
actions.description: Upload a document or provide a webpage URL to parse. Supported formats: PDF, DOCX, Image, Txt File (maximum 10 pages per document).
